sentences.english: You want to go to homecoming with me?
sentences.chinese: 你想和我一起去返校晚会？

sentences.english: Two weeks later , Lily returned to school . If you were Lily , write a diary .
sentences.chinese: 两星期后莉莉返校，她把这次经历写成了日记。

sentences.english: Many people still come to Homecoming twenty or thirty years after their graduation.
sentences.chinese: 许多人在毕业二三十年后还会来参与返校日。

sentences.english: Today is time for returning back to school, everyone is very happy to see Teacher Song again.
sentences.chinese: 今天是返校的日子，大家都很高兴又见到宋老师。

sentences.english: You said that there will be homecoming day this week. Could you talk about it in detail?
sentences.chinese: 你说这周末是返校日。能讲详细一点吗？

sentences.english: The possibility of a return to university faded as the delusions overwhelmed her.
sentences.chinese: 随着她沉沦于这一妄想，返校复读的希望逐渐消失。

sentences.english: The Denton High School football team huddles during the homecoming game.
sentences.chinese: 在返校赛期间，丹顿高中足球队的队员们聚在一起。

sentences.english: This weekend is homecoming. So there's a barbecue tomorrow. And
sentences.chinese: 这周末是返校日，所以明天有烧烤。然后

sentences.english: Two weeks later, Li Fang returned to school. If you were Li Fang, write a diary.
sentences.chinese: 两星期后李方返校，他把这次经历写成日记。

sentences.english: Kinda nervy for someone in your position to be running for homecoming queen.
sentences.chinese: 就你的立场而言竞选返校节皇后有点紧张吧。

sentences.english: I've decided to unground them for the homecoming dance.
sentences.chinese: 所以返校舞会上我还是会支持他们的。

sentences.english: As I was loading my car to go back to school, the phone rang.
sentences.chinese: 等我装车要返校的时候，电话响了。

sentences.english: The next couple of weeks will bring many students back to school.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的几周将是大部分学生返校的时间。

sentences.english: That's because Qu decided to return to campus a few days before the semester began.
sentences.chinese: 因为他决定在新学期开始前几天返校。

sentences.english: He also says going back to school sends a message to those who carried out the attack against the city.
sentences.chinese: 他还说，返校也给那些发动袭击的人传达出一个信息。

sentences.english: Are you looking for a cool back-to-school gadget?
sentences.chinese: 你在寻找新颖的返校小玩意吗？

definition: foundation of a University or College/school opening/the start of a new term
to dismiss students at the end of the school day
to go to school/to attend school
to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
to return to school (after an interruption)/to resume one's studies
to have a holiday or vacation
third year in junior middle school
